title: STK Oak Brook operating hours from December 15
statement: From December 15, STK Oak Brook operates Monday-Thursday 11am-11pm, Friday & Saturday 11am-12am, and Sunday 10am-11pm.

citations.quote: From December 15, STK Oak Brook is open Monday–Thursday 11:00am–11:00pm, Friday & Saturday 11:00am–12:00am, and Sunday 10:00am–11:00pm
